titleStmt.title: Teares for the neuer sufficientlie bewailed death of the late right honourable and most worthie of all honourable titles, Alexander Earle of Dumfermeling, Lord Fyuie, and Vrquhart late Lord Chancellar of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Lyon, John, fl. 1608-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heires of Andro Hart,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
